entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 11:29PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot Over Eastern Northern Alaska Late This Week and Weekend... Temperatures are expected to climb into the 80s over most of the Eastern Interior and Eastern North Slope beginning Friday, with 90s possible by the weekend. Conditions are expected to be dry this week. Smoke will likely become more widespread by the end of the week as well.
